pageProduct.name: Andalou Age Defying Rejuvenating Plant Based Retinol Alternative Cream 50ml
pageProduct.description:
Common Uses

Fruit Stem Cell Complex And Super Antioxidants Boost Dermal Vitality As Bakuchiol, A Natural Plant-Based Alternative To Retinol, Reduces The Appearance Of Lines And Wrinkles And Improves Skin Texture And Tone For A Rejuvenated Complexion.

Ingredients

Ingredients: Aqua/Water/Eau, Glycerin, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Stearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Malus Domestica (Apple) Fruit Cell Culture Extract, Glyceryl Stearate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Bakuchiol, Tapioca Starch, Myristyl Myristate, 1,2 Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice*, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Fruit Cell Extract, Euterpe Oleracea (Acai) Fruit Extract*, Aronia Melanocarpa (Chokeberry) Fruit Extract*, Lycium Barbarum (Goji) Fruit Extract*, Xanthan Gum, Linum Usitatissimum (Flaxseed) Seed Oil*, Allantoin, Helianthus Annuus (Sun?ower) Seed Oil*, Panthenol, Simmondsia Chineses (Jojoba) Seed Oil*, Camellia Sinensis (White Tea) Leaf Extract*†, Squalane, Tocopherol, Sodium Benzoate, Isomalt, Lecithin, Potassium Sorbate, Fragrance (Parfum)
* Certi?ed Organic Ingredient  † Fair Trade Ingredient

Directions

To Use: Am & Pm. Apply To Clean Face And Neck.
